titleStmt.title: SII 36.332: original edition by P Shanmugam
No. 332. (A.R. No. 332 of 1910.) TIRUMEYÑĀNAM, KUMBAKONAM TALUK, TANJORE DISTRICT. On the south wall of the maṇḍapa in front of the central shrine in the Jñānaparamēśvara temple.

summary.p: Registers the resolution of the assembly of Nālūr alias Vānavaṇmādēvi-chaturvēdimaṅgalam not to engage certain persons for doing the temple services. It further declared that those persons who act against the resolution are enemies of the village grāmadrōhin.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī tiripuvaṉac cakkaravattikaḷ śrī rājarāja⌈
devaṟkku yāṇṭu 10 6 vataṉ Etirāmāṇṭu Āvaṇi
mātatoru nāḷ nālūrāna vānavanmātevi carupe
timaṅkala peruṅkuṟi mahāsabhaiyo namūr p
āṇṭaneri puḷi aṭiyile kuṟaivaṟak kūṭi Iruntu vi
yavastai paṇṇinapaṭi nammūril Ūrār nammūrkkum nam
mūril Uṭaiyār tirumayānamuṭaiyār ko
yil Uḷḷuṭṭa koyilkaḷukkum tirumuṟṟaṅkaḷu
kkum kāriyatevaik kūṟuvakaikku koyiṟṟa
ṭṭa tavarai ceyāto
ḻiyavum kāriyañ cetāruṇṭākil kirāmatrohi
kaḷ paṭṭatu paṭuttavum nammūr Āṇṭutoṟum
Āṭṭaivāṇamāka niṟka kaṭavomākavu
m Ippaṭikaḷ tavira ceytāruṇṭākil Ivar
kaḷuṭaṉ śivaśdāśādikaḷ tavirak kaṭavatākavu
m sarvvarum Eḻuttiṭṭa mahāsapā niyokam
Ivarkaḷ Aruḷi ceyya Eḻutiṉen Ūṟ kaṇakku
nālūruṭaiyāṉ tevarāna tirucciṟṟampalamu⌈
ṭaiyān Uttamappiriyaṉ Eḻuttu
Digital edition of SII 36.332 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
